Player History
Drafted in 28th round, 445th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Injured on 8/1/2015 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 5/10/2018 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 3/2/2019 (Going to CHI: 1B Darrell Coleman. Going to MON: 1B Ralph Keiper, C Alberto Perez, P Robert Brinn, CF Robert Straight, P Terry Katz)...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 4/7/2019.
Had first career hit (double) on 5/1/2019, off Jordon Tookes (KC)...
Released by Houston on 6/15/2019...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2020 to a minor league contract.
